short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically linked the copied text with its URL!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is created to increase productivity of the user by automatically linked the copied text with its URL.

What you need to do is select the text you would like to copy and press CTRL + Shift + Space to copy. After that, you can paste it (CTRL + V) at anywhere such as to your email and MS Words. It will appear as a hyperlink!
